comment.author: 81637706@N06
comment._content: What's amazing is all the open space around Trinity College.

comment.author: 81659398@N06
comment._content: This is the original Trinity College in what is today Trinity Bellwoods Park, so the surroundings are still open space. This building was demolished in the early 1950s (I think). Today's Trinity College on University of Toronto campus is a near replica of this building and was built in the 1920s.

comment.author: 19573512@N00
comment._content: the original gates still remain @ the front of bellwoods park, on queen west

comment.author: 15456017@N05
comment._content: In 1856 what is today Trinity Bellwoods Park would have been rather far from downtown  Toronto.
